body:
Comment 2: 
+agl 

Thank you for reporting this issue. This sounds like a sensible request, but the ssh
package may not be the right place for it. Possibly a new package for handling rsa/dsa
keys on disk (in openssh and other formats) for inclusion in go.crypto is in order. I've
cc'd agl for his thoughts.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @davecheney._ _Status changed to **Thinking**._
